title: WTB low grade Type Cards T209/T210/T211/T213, C46, T3 & candy cards 1900's-1919

posts.post_title: WTB low grade Type Cards T209/T210/T211/T213, C46, T3 & candy cards 1900's-1919
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to purchase some cards for my type collection & I need the following (and prefer PSA/SGC/BVG cards graded Authentic/Poor/Fair with clean backs):
T3
T5
C46
T209
T210
T211
T213

I'm looking for an inexpensive type collection so I prefer commons that have good eye appeal in poor or fair condition.  Please message me or email me with your price,  [url]25801wv@gmail.com[/url]
